metadata.synopsis: A Bhaal Reaper in the Temple of Bhaal.

0.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Hiila
0.text: To challenge Lady Orin was bold... To slay her, even bolder. I look forward to your instruction, my liege.
0.context: NodeContext: Smug, appeasing - can't be trusted

1.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Hiila
1.text: You... pet of the Chosen. Your master has been very bold, very bold indeed...
1.context: NodeContext: sneering, thinks themselves above the player

2.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Hiila
2.text: Bhaal's will is clear - this world is ripe for the plucking. If you are not strong enough to lead us, another will.
2.context: NodeContext: Smug, appeasing - can't be trusted

3.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Hiila
3.text: You step on grounds unhallowed. Choose your path wisely - Lady Orin seeks an audience.
3.context: NodeContext: Smug, appeasing - can't be trusted

4.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Hiila
4.text: To challenge Lady Orin was bold... To slay her, even bolder. It is a shame you baulked in the face of godhood.
4.context: NodeContext: Smug, appeasing - can't be trusted

5.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Hiila
5.text: You... pet of the Bhaalspawn. Your master refused a most delicious fate this day.
5.context: NodeContext: sneering, thinks themselves above the player

6.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Hiila
6.text: This world is ripe to be plucked, Chosen... and mashed into a bloody pulp beneath your boot.
